channel.title: CVE Feed for Hancom -- Hancom Office 2020
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hancom -- Hancom Office 2020

item.title: CVE-2022-33896|2024-08-03T08:09:22.670Z -- hancom -- hancom%20office%202020
item.description: A buffer underflow vulnerability exists in the way Hword of Hancom Office 2020 version 11.0.0.5357 parses XML-based office files. A specially-crafted malformed file can cause memory corruption by using memory before buffer start, which can lead to code execution. A victim would need to access a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
